info.name: ascii art video &col (138 chars)
info.description:
Smallest video-to-symbols shader.  ( try other than 13, or without - )

+ color. But the look is very degraded without the 8x16 char format + grey-to-char array as in the 215 version [url]https://shadertoy.com/view/XdGcRD[/url]
